data.eml:eml: Cave millipeds of the United States. V. The genus Idagona Buckett & Gardner (Chordeumatida, Conotylidae, Idagoninae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shear, William A. (2007): Cave millipeds of the United States. V. The genus Idagona Buckett & Gardner (Chordeumatida, Conotylidae, Idagoninae). Zootaxa 1463: 1-12, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176487
